Curl-Curlpp
==============
Bajar paquete
Para ubuntu 14.04 el paquete es: libcurl4-openssl-dev

sudo apt-get install libcurl4-openssl-dev libboost-all-dev

Descargar y destarear curl

wget https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-archive-downloads/v2/code.google.com/curlpp/curlpp-0.7.3.tar.gz
tar zxf curlpp-0.7.3.tar.gz

Instalar

cd curlpp-0.7.3
./configure
make
sudo make install
